metadata.title: CVE-2009-4494 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: AOLserver 4.5.1 writes data to a log file without sanitizing non-printablecharacters, which might allow remote attackers to modify a window's title,or possibly execute arbitrary commands or overwrite files, via an HTTPrequest containing an escape sequence for a terminal emulator.

criterions.comment: aolserver4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
